thread.title: ANDREW
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ANDREW

author: ANDREW
title: ANDREW
text: My booked rental was cancelled without explanation once I arrived at Melb airport - never trust Alpha Car Rentals. But RedSpot rescued me and my family. The staff were so very helpful and offered me a car at the rate I had previously booked, provided an upgrade and helped turn my 4 day rental into 3 days by giving me some grace time upon return! Drop off was problem free and the car was beyond expectations. I'll be using Red Spot again!
